LightningComponentBundle.description: Interactive composite document generation button for PDF/DOCX generation from multiple data sources

property.name: recordIdField
property.label: Record ID Field Name
property.description: Variable name for the primary record ID (e.g., 'accountId', 'opportunityId'). Used when component is on a record page.

property.name: additionalRecordIds
property.label: Additional Record IDs (JSON)
property.description: JSON string of additional record IDs. Example: {"contactId":"003xxx","opportunityId":"006xxx"}

property.name: buttonLabel
property.label: Button Label
property.description: Custom label for the generation button

property.name: successMessage
property.label: Success Message
property.description: Custom message shown in success toast
